description:
While resting at a Pokémon center, Satoshi`s World Coronation Series rank has risen to 273. Satoshi and Go come across Rinto, who is also participating in the World Coronation Series. Satoshi has a battle with Rinto and his Gallade and wins, defeating him with his newly evolved Negigaknight, and bringing his rank to 184.
Source: wikipedia

titles.title: Beyond Chivalry... Aiming to Be a Leek Master!
Mehr als ritterlich... ein aufstrebender Lauchstangen-Meister!
めざせネギマスター! つらぬけ騎士道!!
